text: Hi everyone, I'm Rhea from Philippines. I'm a former senior writer for a food, health, science, and lifestyle magazine. Recently, I did freelance on 30+ food blog posts. I'm looking for a part-time opportunities on content marketing. Send me DM anytime in case you want to see some of my works. Thanks so much! :blush:

text: Hi all, I am Funmi from Nigeria a full time copywriter with over 6+ years of experience working with advertising agencies in some major campaigns for top brands. I am currently navigating my way to content writing and marketing. To this effect, I am looking for any remote internship role in content writing and marketing to help me kick start my career. Thanks
